attributes.action: The Olympic parades scheduled on 17th/18th Oct should be moved to a weekend.
attributes.background: Holding such events on weekdays fails to recognise the desire of the general public to celebrate the fantastic achievements of our inspirational Olympians and Para-Olympians. We should be celebrating together with our children not encouraging them to truant.

rejection.details:
We believe this decision is the responsibility of local councils. If you are in London, the parade is the responsibility of the London Mayor's Office. If you are in Manchester, the parade is organised by Manchester City Council. You can petition either of these councils using the links below:

London Mayor's Office: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

Manchester City Council: http://petitions.manchester.gov.uk/petitions.ti
